programme.title: The First 48 - Blood In The Snow/Swope Park Killing (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: In Kansas City, two veteran detectives tackle a mysterious cases of a young woman brutally murdered in a snowy cul-de-sac, and the murder of a man shot and dumped in a bucolic park.

programme.title: The First 48 - Torn/Gun Crazy (Season 8, Episode 21)
programme.desc: In Louisville, rookie detective Kristen Downs is trying to untangle a love triangle that turned deadly. And in Dallas, lead detective Scott Sayers and his team must piece together what happened inside a car that left the driver dead.

programme.title: The First 48 - Road Hazard/Cold (Season 8, Episode 17)
programme.desc: In Birmingham, Det. Chris Anderson works to unravel the mystery of a motorcycle club president shot in the head after being run off the road. And Louisville Det. Corey Cadwell races against the clock to catch the killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Snapped / Fallen Angel (Season 7, Episode 16)
programme.desc: In Cincinnati, Detectives Jenny Luke and Terry McGuffey investigate the murder of a 56-year-old man brutally beaten to death in the stairwell of his apartment building.

programme.title: The First 48 - Heart of Gold / Last Breath (Season 8, Episode 23)
programme.desc: In Louisville, a 33-year-old woman collapses in the street after being stabbed multiple times. When detectives arrive at the crime scene there's a startling discovery--they're familiar with the victim.

programme.title: The First 48 - Chopper (Season 17, Episode 32)
programme.desc: When an Atlanta father of two is gunned down with an AK-47, rookie detective Scott Berhalter must sift through lies and alibis to get his killers off the street.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Lasting Impressions (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: From the tips of their ears to the soles of their feet--criminals are betrayed by the clues their own bodies leave behind.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Murder Weapon (Season 1, Episode 4)
programme.desc: Weapons are the hallmark of violent crime, tools designed to harm--or kill. Forensic science has developed a world of techniques for tracking and identifying these devices.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Rampage (Season 3, Episode 4)
programme.desc: Four brutal murders in one bloody weekend devastate the small town of Barrie, Ontario. The prime suspects, three violent, escaped convicts, are on the loose.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Shopping Spree Murder (Season 6, Episode 6)
programme.desc: Police try to track down the killer of two elderly women.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Forensics on Trial (Season 2, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A six-year old girl, Andrea Atkinson, is found dead in the boiler room of her Toronto tenement. Forensic investigators quickly determine she has been raped and smothered.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Fremont Bomber (Season 3, Episode 1)
programme.desc: Explosive experts sifting through bomb evidence discover a more insidious plan.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Lasting Impressions (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: From the tips of their ears to the soles of their feet--criminals are betrayed by the clues their own bodies leave behind.
